thread.title: BRIEF-Comtech Announces $11.7 Mln Transceivers Order From U.S. Army

title: BRIEF-Comtech Announces $11.7 Mln Transceivers Order From U.S. Army

organizations.name: mln transceivers order from u.s. army

text: 10 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Comtech Announces $11.7 Mln Transceivers Order From U.S. Army Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 21 (Reuters) - Comtech Telecommunications Corp: * COMTECH ANNOUNCES INITIAL $11.7 MILLION ORDER TO PROVIDE SEVERAL THOUSAND MOBILE SATELLITE TRANSCEIVERS TO SUPPORT THE U.S. ARMY’S BLUE FORCE TRACKING-2 PROGRAM * COMTECH TELECOMMUNICATIONS - ‍DURING Q2, COMMAND AND CONTROL TECHNOLOGIES GROUP, THROUGH UNIT AWARDED INITIAL $11.7 MILLION ORDER​ * COMTECH TELECOMMUNICATIONS CORP - ‍COMTECH EXPECTS TO BEGIN SHIPMENTS DURING SECOND HALF OF ITS FISCAL 2018​ Source text for Eikon:
